page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Only about half of the people living in this area aged over 16 are economi- cally active.Just over 100 of them are retired & a further 50 or so are full- time students.Twice as many men as women are in paid employment. Although agriculture is the major land use it only employs 10% of the workforce.This is because farming in this area is highly mechanised.A further 10% of workers are employed in manufacturing, mainly in the few factories in Petersfield.About 20% of workers(men only)are employed in the construction industry.Next comes catering & distri- bution,employing about 25% of the local workforce. 'Other services' are the main employer providing about 35% of local jobs & include manual,white collar & professional jobs. Although unemployment is national problem,it is not quite so serious in this area.
